caption.p: The echocardiography results from the six experimental groups ( n = 8 per group) and Viral replication in the myocardium ( n = 5 per group). (a), Typical M-mode echocardiograms of the short-axis midventricular view on d 14. (b), The differences of LVEDd, LVESd, LVEF, and LVFS among six groups on d 7 and 14. (c) Viral replication in the myocardium of each group. Data are expressed as means ± SD. * p< 0.05 vs. VMC group. # p< 0.05 vs. VMC+Sham group. + p< 0.05 vs. VMC+Vag group. & p< 0.05 vs. VMC+V+P group
